About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Gday! I'm an Australian developer livng in London. Although I am fairly new the world of coding you'll appreciate how much work I am willing to put in to get you what you want. I am self taught so I understand the importance of hardwork, passion and motivation(Motivation is definitely something you need if you're self teaching during covid!).
